official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on NEUROLITE (complete dosage kits) and Bicisate Dihydrochloride 0.9 mg (ECE-2HCl).

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on: (1) NEUROLITE (complete dosage kits); and (2) bicisate dihydrochloride 0.9 mg (ECD-2HCL).

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on NEUROLITE (complete dosage kits) and Bicisate Dihydrochloride 0.9 mg (ECE-2HCl).
